summary: This document is an email chain forwarded by attorney Stacey Richman, originating from an individual claiming to be a senior police officer. The email makes serious allegations about the death of Jeffrey Epstein, naming two killers and referencing a confession file and cooperation between government members and prosecutors. It warns of increasing pressure and threats against the recipient, Mark L. Epstein.

keyFacts: An individual claiming to be a senior police officer (R O) contacted Mark L. Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, with allegations about Jeffrey's death.
The email claims to name two of Jeffrey Epstein's killers and references a 'confession file of the prison guards'.
The email alleges a 'report on the cooperation of government members and prosecutors' related to the case.
The sender warns Mark L. Epstein that 'pressure and threats against you will increase' and that 'some people are trying to take you to court'.
The correspondence was forwarded through legal channels, from Mark Epstein to his attorney Stacey Richman, who then forwarded it further.
